main event: On April 5th, 1952, at 10:30 MST in Phoenix, Arizona, four civilians witnessed three large, circular objects of dull grey color with no wings, fins, or smoke flying at a very fast speed and forming a V-formation.
interesting points: The objects were reported to have disappeared and reappeared, joining with two additional objects to form a V-formation.
Two F-86 aircrafts landed at Luke AFB from Winslow shortly after the sighting, and three F-51 aircrafts were enroute from Phoenix to Winslow at the time.
The UFOs were observed flying at an altitude of over 40,000 feet with a speed described as approximately half the rate of a 'falling comet'.
The witnesses noted that the objects had a dull grey color resembling unpolished aluminum and made straight and level maneuvers.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were reported as clear ceiling, 45 miles visibility, and calm wind.
sighted object: Three large, circular objects of dull grey color with no wings, fins, or smoke
